name: transfermarkt_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on Transfermarkt in parallel.

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const boxes = document.querySelectorAll('.box'); let playersBox = null; for (const box of boxes) { const h2 = box.querySelector('h2'); if (h2 && /player/i.test(h2.textContent)) { playersBox = box; break; } } const container = playersBox || document; container.querySelectorAll('tbody tr.odd, tbody tr.even').forEach((el, i) => { if (i < 15) { const nameEl = el.querySelector('td.hauptlink a'); const posEl = el.querySelector('td.zentriert'); const clubEl = el.querySelector('img.tiny_wappen'); const valueEl = el.querySelector('td.rechts.hauptlink'); results.push({ name: nameEl?.getAttribute('title') || nameEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', url: nameEl?.href ? 'https://www.transfermarkt.com' + nameEl.getAttribute('href') : '', position: posEl?.textContent?.trim() || '', club: clubEl?.getAttribute('title') || '', market_value: valueEl?.textContent?.trim() || '' }); } }); const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('query') || '', result_count: results.length, results };
detailSteps.name: results
